attributes.action: Stop Royal Mail merging Delivery Office and taking them out of Tameside
attributes.background: Royal Mail are wanting to take all Delivery Offices out of Tameside and merged with offices outside Tameside, which means traveling over Five miles for the public to pick their post up.

rejection.details:
This is an operational decision for Royal Mail, which has been privatised. You could raise this issue directly with Royal Mail itself.

You can find out more about how Royal Mail is regulated here:

http://www.royalmailgroup.com/about-us/regulation/how-were-regulated
